mapper.select: WITH PRODCART AS( SELECT DISTINCT PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_LGU, PROD_BUYER, PROD_COST PROD_PRICE, PROD_SALE, PROD_OUTLINE, PROD_DETAIL, PROD_IMG PROD_TOTALSTOCK, TO_CHAR(PROD_INSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PROD_INSDATE, PROD_PROPERSTOCK, PROD_SIZE, PROD_COLOR PROD_DELIVERY, PROD_UNIT, PROD_QTYIN, PROD_QTYSALE, PROD_MILEAGE , CART.* FROM PROD LEFT OUTER JOIN CART ON (PROD_ID = CART_PROD) WHERE PROD_ID = #{prod_id} ) SELECT PRODCART.*, CART_MEMBER FROM PRODCART LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER ON (CART_MEMBER = MEM_ID)
